languages.text: В атриуме стоит паника: в полумраке, разгоняемом лишь мерцанием аварийных люменов, видны мечущиеся силуэты, слышны отрывистые приказы и чьи-то исступленные молитвы. Оставшись без связи, обезглавленный корабль бьется в агонии.

traits.locale_text: В атриуме стоит паника: в полумраке, разгоняемом лишь мерцанием аварийных люменов, видны мечущиеся силуэты, слышны отрывистые приказы и чьи-то исступленные молитвы. Оставшись без связи, обезглавленный корабль бьется в агонии.

languages.text: The atrium is in a state of panic — silhouettes skitter about in the dark hall, illuminated only by the flickering of emergency lumens. Curt orders and someone's feverish words of prayer can be heard. Having lost all communication, the beheaded ship is writhing in agony.
languages.original_text: В атриуме стоит паника: в полумраке, разгоняемом лишь мерцанием аварийных люменов, видны мечущиеся силуэты, слышны отрывистые приказы и чьи-то исступленные молитвы. Оставшись без связи, обезглавленный корабль бьется в агонии.

traits.locale_text: The atrium is in a state of panic — in the dark hall, illuminated only by the flickering of emergency lumens, silhouettes are milling about accompanied by curt orders and someone's feverish words of prayer. Having lost all communication, the beheaded ship is writhing in agony.

The atrium is in a state of panic — in the dark hall, illuminated only by the flickering of emergency lumens, silhouettes are milling about accompanied by curt orders and someone's feverish words of prayer. Having lost all communication, the beheaded ship is writhing in agony.

The atrium is in a state of panic — silhouettes skitter about in the dark hall, illuminated only by the flickering of emergency lumens. Curt orders and someone's feverish words of prayer can be heard. Having lost all communication, the beheaded ship is writhing in agony.

The atrium is in a state of panic — silhouettes skitter about in the dark hall, illuminated only by the flickering of emergency lumens. Curt orders and someone's feverish words of prayer can be heard. Having lost all communication, the beheaded ship is writhing in agony.

The atrium is in a state of panic — silhouettes skitter about in the dark hall, illuminated only by the flickering of emergency lumens. Curt orders and someone's feverish words of prayer can be heard. Having lost all communication, the beheaded ship is writhing in agony.

languages.text: El atrio es presa del pánico. Hay siluetas correteando entre las sombras proyectadas por los lumens de emergencia. Se oyen órdenes breves y una febril plegaria. La nave, decapitada, se retuerce agónica tras perder toda comunicación.
languages.original_text: The atrium is in a state of panic — silhouettes skitter about in the dark hall, illuminated only by the flickering of emergency lumens. Curt orders and someone's feverish words of prayer can be heard. Having lost all communication, the beheaded ship is writhing in agony.

traits.locale_text: El atrio es presa del pánico. Hay siluetas correteando entre las sombras proyectadas por los lumens de emergencia. Se oyen órdenes breves y una febril plegaria. La nave, decapitada, se retuerce agónica tras perder toda comunicación.

languages.text: 舰船中庭处于一片恐慌之中。阴暗的大厅中只有应急灯的灯光，黑压压的人影窜来窜去，人群中传来了粗暴的命令声与狂热的祷告声。由于失去了所有的通讯能力，飞船仿佛一只被砍断了头的动物，痛苦地扭动着。
languages.original_text: The atrium is in a state of panic — silhouettes skitter about in the dark hall, illuminated only by the flickering of emergency lumens. Curt orders and someone's feverish words of prayer can be heard. Having lost all communication, the beheaded ship is writhing in agony.

traits.locale_text: 舰船中庭处于一片恐慌之中。阴暗的大厅中只有应急灯的灯光，黑压压的人影窜来窜去，人群中传来了粗暴的命令声与狂热的祷告声。由于失去了所有的通讯能力，飞船仿佛一只被砍断了头的动物，痛苦地扭动着。

languages.text: アトリウムはパニック状態だった。非常用照明のちらつきだけで照らされた暗いホールに浮かぶ影があちらこちらへと飛び回る。淡々とした命令と誰かの没頭する祈りの声が聞こえた。一切の通信を失い、頭を失った船は悶え苦しんでいる。
languages.original_text: The atrium is in a state of panic — silhouettes skitter about in the dark hall, illuminated only by the flickering of emergency lumens. Curt orders and someone's feverish words of prayer can be heard. Having lost all communication, the beheaded ship is writhing in agony.

traits.locale_text: アトリウムはパニック状態だった。非常用照明のちらつきだけで照らされた暗いホールに浮かぶ影があちらこちらへと飛び回る。淡々とした命令と誰かの没頭する祈りの声が聞こえた。一切の通信を失い、頭を失った船は悶え苦しんでいる。

languages.text: Im Atrium herrscht Panik ... Silhouetten huschen in der dunklen Halle umher, die nur durch das Flackern von Notleuchten erhellt wird. Man hört die knappe Befehle und fiebrige Gebete. Das enthauptete Schiff hat jegliche Kommunikation verloren und windet sich im Todeskampf.
languages.original_text: The atrium is in a state of panic — silhouettes skitter about in the dark hall, illuminated only by the flickering of emergency lumens. Curt orders and someone's feverish words of prayer can be heard. Having lost all communication, the beheaded ship is writhing in agony.

languages.text: La panique s'est emparée de l'Atrium. Des silhouettes s'affairent frénétiquement dans la salle obscure, éclairée uniquement par la lueur vacillante des lumens de secours. On entend quelqu'un donner des ordres sur un ton sec, tandis qu'une autre voix récite une prière fébrile. Privé de tout moyen de communication, le vaisseau sans tête se tord de douleur.
languages.original_text: The atrium is in a state of panic — silhouettes skitter about in the dark hall, illuminated only by the flickering of emergency lumens. Curt orders and someone's feverish words of prayer can be heard. Having lost all communication, the beheaded ship is writhing in agony.

traits.locale_text: La panique s'est emparée de l'Atrium. Des silhouettes s'affairent frénétiquement dans la salle obscure, éclairée uniquement par la lueur vacillante des lumens de secours. On entend quelqu'un donner des ordres sur un ton sec, tandis qu'une autre voix récite une prière fébrile. Privé de tout moyen de communication, le vaisseau sans tête se tord de douleur.

languages.text: Atriyuma panik hâkim. Karanlık salonda sıçrayan silüetler, yalnızca acil durum lümenlerinin titrek ışıklarıyla görülebiliyor. Sert emirler ve birinin hummalı sözlerle ettiği dua duyuluyor. Tüm iletişimi kaybetmiş gemi, kafası kesik bir groks gibi oradan oraya sürükleniyor.
languages.original_text: The atrium is in a state of panic — silhouettes skitter about in the dark hall, illuminated only by the flickering of emergency lumens. Curt orders and someone's feverish words of prayer can be heard. Having lost all communication, the beheaded ship is writhing in agony.

traits.locale_text: Atriyuma panik hâkim. Karanlık salonda sıçrayan siluetler, yalnızca acil durum lümenlerinin titrek ışıklarıyla aydınlanıyor. Sert emirler ve birinin hummalı duası duyuluyor. Tüm iletişimi kaybetmiş gemi, kafası kesik groks gibi oradan oraya sürükleniyor.
